Comment: Abilities: A0FO (Siphon Mana), Ubertip (Tooltip - Normal - Extended)
Value: Transfers Chaotic Energy between The Magus and a target. Drains 15 mana per second from an enemy, or transfers 10 mana per second to an ally.|n|nSiphon Mana can push the Magus' mana over its maximum value, though excess mana drains off rapidly if not used.|nLasts 6 seconds.
